InstalledItem.Name: M7A Cannon
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Item Type: Laser Cannon
Size: 5

This versatile long distance energy autocannon is the latest in Behring’s M-Series. The M7A is designed to act as a high impact deterrent effective at medium to long range. The new AC8 Lens system minimizes stopping power loss over distance, making each shot equally effective at longer ranges.

InstalledItem.Name: Remote Turret
InstalledItem.Description: Remote Turret

InstalledItem.Name: CF-337 Panther Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 3

The CF-337 Panther is the size three model in Klaus & Werner's laser repeater line. The Panther is a true fire-and-forget weapon with a respectable power consumption-to-damage ratio. Pilots who outfit their ships with Panthers rarely regret the decision.

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-543 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 5
Missiles: 4xS3

Behring’s MSD-543 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 5 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of four S3 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: Arrester III Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Cross Section
Size: 3

Using cross section targeting to hunt for its prey, the Firestorm Arrester proximity missile makes quick work of enemies caught in the crosshairs.

InstalledItem.Name: Stronghold
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Basilisk 
Size: 3
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

The Stronghold shield generator uses patented hull plating techniques to reinforce the generator’s body to make it one of the sturdiest on the market. That means the shield and component are both built to last.

InstalledItem.Name: Durango
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Juno Starwerk
Size: 3
Grade: A
Class: Industrial

The Durango is the peak of large power plants produced by Juno Starwerk. This top-of-the-line industrial component provides unmatched energy dispersion that minimizes fluctuations and surges during heavy demand.

InstalledItem.Name: FrostBurn
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Lightning Power Ltd. 
Size: 3
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Lightning Power Ltd. has put its years of design expertise and manufacturing know-how to craft the FrostBurn, an effective cooler that can handle the large scale heat management needs of a wide variety of ships on the market.
